MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Maes Garmon and the surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network. Due to the complexity of the repairs required our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30am on the 26th February 2021.
